menu_option_descriptions.credentials: The recommended method. The integration will sign in with your email and password to get the necessary tokens.
menu_option_descriptions.tokens: For advanced users. Manually provide the login token, user ID, and auth token.

init.title: Re-authenticate
init.description:
To manually re-authenticate your credentials, click below to go through the authentication process again.

You will need to re-enter your credentials, but your device settings will be preserved.
